body.p:
Louisville Ky
Feb 26. 1863
Hon James Speed
Dear Sir.

Being about to enter upon the profession of the law and deeming it essential to the prosecution of that profession to be clothed with the powers of a Notary Public -- I beg of you that I may be proposed as a candidate for such appointment

Yours most Respectfully
Lemuel S. Hardin
